channel.title: [317][Delta] Creating a Loan sytem [Development Team]
channel.description:
Well i recently wen on runescape (first in a real long time) and i saw that they have a loaning option in the trade interface. I want to create this for servers.
Explaining - I want another choice when you are in the trade interface when you right-click an item. That choice will be "loan", then you will have a choice on how long you wish to loan the item to the other player.
Development Team - If you want to help me on this then please post in this format:
[code]Name: Coding skills: How long you have been coding: Examples of your work: when you are available: MSN: [/code]
Here is the proof: [quote="Bebe"][quote author=Darkning link=action=profile;u=351312 date=1235528279] i mean like trade loan, you can loan items for an x amount of time to another player.
I plan on recruiting coders that work well, mature (i dont want goof offs), and are known in this community. I will ask them to fill out a form. [/quote] Ok, you're allowed as long as you comply with all forum rules.[/quote]

item.title: [317][Delta] Creating a Loan sytem [Development Team]
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

tbh supra your right,half the reason all the servers in development and downloads and help section are mostly delta,and the people who ask the most serious questions are the people who are trying to help the community but releasing a good nice clean project,if we had more people who read up on conventions and looked at a couple tuts to learn we wouldnt have such a nooby community.

post a serious topic in the help section for this and malby if your lucky you will get a good awsner,like show what you have thrown together and see if,dont just say “i need help with a loan system in a delta source”,because thats just going to get you no where.

post somthing like this:

alright ive been trying to add a loan system into my delta based source and this is what i have, 
blah blah blah

and i get so and nothing works could one of you malby modify my code and help me,is so that would be great.

end of topic.

and malby you will get a some help

Read full topic

2. I tryed to create it once before but it failed.[/quote]

then you should ask help into a help section end not create a development team that does it for you ?

  • This is not a spoonfeeding community so basicly u try to do other people something u cant …
    i dont know why a moderator would allow this :o

item.title: [317][Delta] Creating a Loan sytem [Development Team]
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

i dont think it is that hard …

add client side the right click option “loan” to your objects

then go server side end add a few commands that dont allow to sell items you lend from somone end if you use option return it goes back to the original owner

you need a development team for this ?

Read full topic
